Package com.flipkart.dao

Class AdminDAOOperation

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.dao.AdminDAOOperation
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminDAOInterface
public class AdminDAOOperation
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdminDAOInterface
Data Access object for Admin class which is responsible for all the interactions that happen with the SQL database.
Author:
JEDI04

      Verifies Email Address at the time of registration
      Specified by:
      verifyEmail in interface AdminDAOInterface
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • addAdmin

      public int addAdmin​(java.lang.String password, Admin admin) throws AdminCRSException, java.lang.Exception
      addAdmin is used to add the new Admin details in Credentials table and Admin table
      Specified by:
      addAdmin in interface AdminDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      password - User provided password for the new Admin to be added.
      admin - Other details of the admin sent inside Admin bean class by using its attributes.
      Returns:
      Returns 1 if new admin is successfully added. Else returns 0.
      Throws:
      AdminCRSException
      java.lang.Exception

      public boolean allotCourses​(int courseId, int professorID) throws AdminCRSException, java.lang.Exception

      Specified by:
